cleaned_text: [Natural Medicines](https://login.uportland.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com) This link opens in a new window Provides evidence-based information about complementary and alternative therapies. Separate [Health & Wellness database](https://login.uportland.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com/databases/health-wellness.aspx) rates effectiveness of specific diets and activities as well as some therapies.
